name: scrollhub
description: ScrollHub turns any server into a place where people can instantly launch unlimited new (ephemeral) website powered by Scroll.
author: Breck Yunits

scripts.up: npm install scroll-cli@latest; cp ~/tryscroll/dist/constants.js ide/parsers.js; cp ~/tryscroll/dist/libs.js ide/libs.js
scripts.deploy: git push github; git push gitlab; ssh root@hub.scroll.pub 'cd ScrollHub && npm run upgrade'
scripts.upgrade: git pull && npm install . && npm install -g scroll-cli prettier && pm2 restart server && npm run build
